DeterministicCommsSupport.description: Are data transfers for this service/slice deterministic/predictable, or not

V2XSupport.description: Does this service/slice require V2X communications, or not

SimultaneousSliceOperation.description: Can the service use shared slicing resources, or not, and if so which type

MissionCriticalSupport.description: Does the service require mission critical support, or not

Reliability.description: Addressed by 3GPP SA5  for uRLLC, not needed for the others.

Availability.description: Addressed by 3GPP SA5  for uRLLC, not needed for the others.

MmtelSupport.description: Indicates whether or not the the service requires MMTel/IMS support

PositioningSupport.description: Indicates whether or not the the service requires positioning support

SupportForNon-IpTraffic.description: Indicates whether or not provides non-IP (ethernet session and forwarding support) session support of communication devices

SessionAndServiceContinuity.description: Indicates which session and service continuity mode is needed
